name: Sky Lagoon
description:
Sky Lagoon is a 3D shoot'em up where you'll play as one of the sky units deployed to fend off the Sky invaders and take back the precious sky lagoon !

This game was created for the Mixed Game Jam 2020 and it's one of my first 3D project with unity !

Have fun playing and don't hesitate to share you're feedbacks !

All musics used belong to their rightfull owner.

Game made by : Job Corentin / Twitter
